page.title: 07INDOOR RECREATION.
page.content: The major facility for indoor recreation in the area is West Kirby Concourse which is a purpose built sports and leisure complex. The Concourse was opened in 1974 and cost 4.5 million pounds to build and provides the local people with many facilities.It is estimated that about 7,500 people per week use the Concourse during the summer months. The facilities include an indoor swimming pool,a sports hall where the folowing activities can be pursued:- badminton,short tennis,karate,yoga, five-a-side football,judo,keep fit,gymnastics,trampolining,netball, basket ball and volleyball. There are also squash courts and individual sports rooms which can be hired by local organisations and clubs throughout the year.
